name: Randy Greene
text: As a franchise establishment this place seemed to be run fairly well, however the pizza itself was very disappointing. It's not the same as it was last time I was here. The crust is no longer light and crispy, it's chewy and flavorless. Will not return.

name: Krystal Dickens
text: Wonderful service we had a party of 8 or 9 for my birthday and they were excellent in providing service.

text: THEY DONT HAVE MUCH A GOOD SELECTION OF PIZZA OR ENTREES ANYMORE SINCE COVID! THEY NEED TO BRING BACK THE BOURBON CHICKEN PIZZA THEY MAY GET MORE BUSINESS!

name: Melissa Anne
text: It was ok. The buffet was not up to its usual standards. It could be with the virus precautions that have been implemented, the service was so-so, the spots were empty and the food was fair.

name: Tamara Arrington
text: Great pizza for an affordable price. Chocolate chip pizzert is a must have. Easy to order online and quick service.

name: Doug Belt
text: Restraunt was one of the nicest I've been to for a pizza inn. Service and food both good too.

text: Took my loved ones to Pizza Inn on Valentine's day. It was extremely busy but very efficient. Food was wonderful. Buffett was serviced constantly so there was limited time waiting for our favorites. Everyone was courteous.  And finally, we fed 4 grandkids, a daughter and myself for about 50 dollars. It was a wonderful night.

name: Leslie C. Evans
text: Good service,food

name: Jennifer Aubut
text: Very popular place! Lots of parking and lots of seating. Seems they have a hard time keeping pizzas out the few times we have been here. Had to wait 15 mins for a pizza more than once at the buffet. Salad bar is always stocked well each visit.

name: Morgan Knight
text: This has got to be the nicest Pizza Inn I have ever been to. Very clean, spacious, and all together well designed. The service was great and the food was fresh every visit to the buffet. I will gladly drive the extra distance to go to this location.

text: We don't have a Pizza Inn near us so every time we travel down I-95 we make a point to stop in. Wonderful food (dessert pizza far superior to any other dessert pizza), great service, VERY reasonable price. The unlimited buffet (pizza, salad bar, spaghetti and did I mention the world's best dessert pizzas), all for $6.49.
